comments:
Deploy on weblogic 9 doesn't work [0601]
Build number:
2.2.0.v20070620-1031
Steps to repreduce:
1. Start Weblogic8 application server
2. Modify birt.war to include commons-logging-api.jar which is in \\spm2003\c$\BIRT_Deploy_Smoke.
3. Deploy birt.war through weblogic console
4. Open IE and type http://pcname:7001/birt/index.jsp.
5. Click the sample report link.
Expected result:
Report can be displayed properly
Actual result:
Exception was throwsn
